snippet: SOLE--Sheila R. August 7, 1939 - July 16, 2016. Born and raised in Manhattan, a devoted and indomitable spirit. Survived by her beloved children, Andrew, Allison and Steven, grandson Samuel Asher and daughter-in-law Melissa. Services at Plaza Jewi...
lead_paragraph: SOLE--Sheila R. August 7, 1939 - July 16, 2016. Born and raised in Manhattan, a devoted and indomitable spirit. Survived by her beloved children, Andrew, Allison and Steven, grandson Samuel Asher and daughter-in-law Melissa. Services at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Ave., at 11am Tuesday, July 19. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SOLE, SHEILA R
